data.text: @samstreetwrites How are the restrictions regarding travel to Serbia?

@UrbanExplorer00 Covid Passes were for after 8pm.

Though in practice I think everything had become only 'recommended' a long time ago.
@samstreetwrites This shit still exists there? Wrf

@samstreetwrites From 25th March.  No entry requirements
https://t.co/zrQXlQHU0P
@samstreetwrites Is there a handy list anywhere of European countries with no mask mandate on public transport, esp long distance trains?
@samstreetwrites We need a list of countries without face nappy mandate please. It will be super helpful for planning overseas trip.
@samstreetwrites I've heard Montenegro will be following shortly too
@samstreetwrites Elections in less than a month. They will re introduce the measures once they are over. Literally did the same thing at the start of the pandemic.
@samstreetwrites Good news, yet they were barely enforced in places like #Belgrade. Apparently the virus only appears after 8pm in #Serbia.
@samstreetwrites Are you coming to the pub or not?
